setup-worktree-unix: if [ ! -f .env.local ]; then MAIN_WORKTREE=$(git worktree list | head -1 | awk '{print $1}'); if [ -f "$MAIN_WORKTREE/.env.local" ]; then cp "$MAIN_WORKTREE/.env.local" .env.local && echo "✓ Copied .env.local from main worktree"; else echo "⚠ Warning: .env.local not found in main worktree at $MAIN_WORKTREE"; fi; else echo "✓ .env.local already exists"; fi
